li.p: Base package. The base package consists of all open source components and is licensed under the GNU General Public License V3.

Extension packs. Additional extension packs can be downloaded which extend the functionality of the base package. Currently, Oracle provides a single extension pack, available from: http://www.virtualbox.org. The extension pack provides the following added functionality:
VirtualBox Remote Desktop Protocol (VRDP) support. See Remote Display (VRDP Support).
Host webcam passthrough. See Webcam Passthrough.
Disk image encryption with AES algorithm. See Encryption of Disk Images.
